languages.text: "Да, Ваша Светлость, любопытно судьба повернулась". {n}Судя по боли и гневу на мгновение промелькнувших во взгляде Капеллана, он прекрасно понимает по чьей милости начались расправы над друзианцами. Но сдерживается.{/n} "Ее Светлость Инцендия сама меня судила, но как ни пыталась, черноты во мне так и не усмотрела. Даже неловко как-то было. Поводов для радости тут, правда, мало — она повелела мне лично исполнять ее приговоры в отношении моих братьев и сестер. Тяжкое бремя... Но лучше я, чем ее палачи". {n}Мужчина умолкает и стискивает кулаки до хруста.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Да, Ваша Светлость, любопытно судьба повернулась". {n}Судя по боли и гневу на мгновение промелькнувших во взгляде Капеллана, он прекрасно понимает по чьей милости начались расправы над друзианцами. Но сдерживается.{/n} "Ее Светлость Инцендия сама меня судила, но как ни пыталась, черноты во мне так и не усмотрела. Даже неловко как-то было. Поводов для радости тут, правда, мало — она повелела мне лично исполнять ее приговоры в отношении моих братьев и сестер. Тяжкое бремя... Но лучше я, чем ее палачи". {n}Мужчина умолкает и стискивает кулаки до хруста.{/n}

languages.text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's a curious turn of fate." {n}Judging by the pain and anger that flash in Chaplain's eyes for an instant, he knows full well who instigated the violence against the Drusians. But he contains himself.{/n} "Her Ladyship Incendia judged me herself, and hard as she tried, she saw no darkness in me. It was a bit awkward, as a matter of fact. Not that it's anything to rejoice at. She ordered me to personally carry out her verdicts against my brothers and sisters. A heavy burden... But better me than her executioners." {n}The man falls silent and clenches his fists until they crack.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Да, Ваша Светлость, любопытно судьба повернулась". {n}Судя по боли и гневу на мгновение промелькнувших во взгляде Капеллана, он прекрасно понимает по чьей милости начались расправы над друзианцами. Поводов для радости тут, правда, мало — она повелела мне лично исполнять ее приговоры в отношении моих братьев и сестер. Тяжкое бремя... Но лучше я, чем ее палачи". {n}Мужчина умолкает и стискивает кулаки до хруста.{/n}

But better me than her executioners." {n}The man falls silent and clenches his fists until they crack.{/n}

languages.text: “是啊，大人，命运真是奇妙。”{n}牧师眼中闪过了一丝痛苦与愤怒。看得出来，他很清楚是谁煽动了对德鲁苏斯教派的暴力行为，但到最后，他克制住了自己的情绪。{/n}“因森蒂娅女士亲自对我进行了审判。尽管她很努力地想让我认罪，但她却无法在我身上找到一丝邪恶。老实说，当时的情况甚至有点令人尴尬。这并不是件令人高兴的事情，因为她命令我亲自为我的兄弟姐妹执行死刑。这是个沉重的负担……但由我动手，总比由她的刽子手动手要好。”{n}他沉默不语，攥紧了拳头，骨节发出了噼啪声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's a curious turn of fate." {n}Judging by the pain and anger that flash in Chaplain's eyes for an instant, he knows full well who instigated the violence against the Drusians. But he contains himself.{/n} "Her Ladyship Incendia judged me herself, and hard as she tried, she saw no darkness in me. It was a bit awkward, as a matter of fact. Not that it's anything to rejoice at. She ordered me to personally carry out her verdicts against my brothers and sisters. A heavy burden... But better me than her executioners." {n}The man falls silent and clenches his fists until they crack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是啊，大人，命运真是奇妙。”{n}牧师眼中闪过了一丝痛苦与愤怒。看得出来，他很清楚是谁煽动了对德鲁苏斯教派的暴力行为，但到最后，他克制住了自己的情绪。{/n}“因森蒂娅女士亲自对我进行了审判。尽管她很努力地想让我认罪，但她却无法在我身上找到任何邪恶，当时的情况甚至有点令人尴尬。这并不是件令人高兴的事情，因为她命令我亲自为我的兄弟姐妹执行死刑。这是个沉重的负担……但由我动手，总比由她的刽子手动手要好。”{n}他沉默不语，攥紧了拳头，骨节发出了噼啪声。{/n}

languages.text: 「はい、陛下」{n}教戒官の目に一瞬、怒りの感情が光った。ドルスス教に対する暴力を扇動したか者が何者か、気が付いている事を示している。だが、自我を保っていた。{/n} 「インセンディア女帝は私を見て、どんなに頑張ろうとも私の中に闇を見つけることは出来ませんでした。正直、気まずいくらいでした。いや、別に喜ぶ事でもありません。彼女は、私の兄弟と姉妹の判決を自ら実行するよう命じました。重い仕事です…ですが、彼女の執行人にやられるよりかは、私がやったほうがマシです」{n}男は沈黙し、ポキポキと音がするまで、拳を握りしめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's a curious turn of fate." {n}Judging by the pain and anger that flash in Chaplain's eyes for an instant, he knows full well who instigated the violence against the Drusians. But he contains himself.{/n} "Her Ladyship Incendia judged me herself, and hard as she tried, she saw no darkness in me. It was a bit awkward, as a matter of fact. Not that it's anything to rejoice at. She ordered me to personally carry out her verdicts against my brothers and sisters. A heavy burden... But better me than her executioners." {n}The man falls silent and clenches his fists until they crack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「はい、陛下」{n}教戒官の目に一瞬、怒りの感情が光った。ドルスス教に対する暴力を扇動したか者が何者か、気が付いている事を示している。だが、自我を保っていた。{/n} 「インセンディア女帝は私を見て、どんなに頑張ろうとも私の中に闇を見つけることは出来ませんでした。気まずいくらいでした。いや、別に喜ぶ事でもありません。彼女は、私の兄弟と姉妹の判決を自ら実行するよう命じました。重い仕事です…ですが、彼女の執行人にやられるよりかは、私がやったほうがマシです」{n}男は沈黙し、ポキポキと音がするまで、拳を握りしめた。{/n}

languages.text: «Sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}, es un curioso giro de los acontecimientos». {n}A juzgar por el dolor y la rabia en los ojos de Capellán, sabe perfectamente quién instigó la violencia contra los drusianos, pero se contiene.{/n} «Milady Incendia me juzgó y, por mucho que lo intentó, no vio oscuridad en mí. Fue un poco embarazoso, a decir verdad. Tampoco es que sea algo por lo que alegrarse. Me ordenó llevar a cabo yo mismo sus veredictos contra mis hermanos y hermanas. Una gran carga... pero mejor yo que sus verdugos». {n}El hombre se calla y aprieta los puños hasta que hacen ruido.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's a curious turn of fate." {n}Judging by the pain and anger that flash in Chaplain's eyes for an instant, he knows full well who instigated the violence against the Drusians. But he contains himself.{/n} "Her Ladyship Incendia judged me herself, and hard as she tried, she saw no darkness in me. It was a bit awkward, as a matter of fact. Not that it's anything to rejoice at. She ordered me to personally carry out her verdicts against my brothers and sisters. A heavy burden... But better me than her executioners." {n}The man falls silent and clenches his fists until they crack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}, es un curioso giro de los acontecimientos». {n}A juzgar por el dolor y la rabia en los ojos del capellán, sabe perfectamente quién instigó la violencia contra los drusianos, pero se contiene.{/n} «Milady Incendia me juzgó y, por mucho que lo intentó, no vio oscuridad en mí. Fue incluso un poco embarazoso. Tampoco es que sea algo por lo que alegrarse. Me ordenó llevar a cabo yo mismo sus veredictos contra mis hermanos y hermanas. Una gran carga... pero mejor yo que sus verdugos». {n}El hombre se calla y aprieta los puños hasta que hacen ruido.{/n}

languages.text: "Ja, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, es ist eine merkwürdige Wendung des Schicksals." {n}Schmerz und Zorn lodern einen kurzen Moment lang in den Augen des Ordenspriesters auf. Er weiß offenbar genau, wer die Gewalt gegen die Drusianer angezettelt hat. Doch er hält an sich.{/n} "Ihre Ladyschaft Incendia hat selbst über mich geurteilt, und so sehr sie sich auch bemüht hat, sie hat keine Dunkelheit in mir gesehen. Es war schon fast ein wenig unangenehm. Nicht, dass das etwas wäre, worüber man frohlocken könnte. Sie hat mir befohlen, persönlich ihre Urteile gegen meine Brüder und Schwestern auszuführen. Eine schwere Last ... Aber besser ich als ihre Henker." {n}Der Mann verstummt und ballt die Fäuste, bis sie knacken.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's a curious turn of fate." {n}Judging by the pain and anger that flash in Chaplain's eyes for an instant, he knows full well who instigated the violence against the Drusians. But he contains himself.{/n} "Her Ladyship Incendia judged me herself, and hard as she tried, she saw no darkness in me. It was a bit awkward, as a matter of fact. Not that it's anything to rejoice at. She ordered me to personally carry out her verdicts against my brothers and sisters. A heavy burden... But better me than her executioners." {n}The man falls silent and clenches his fists until they crack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, es ist eine merkwürdige Wendung des Schicksals." {n}Schmerz und Zorn lodern einen kurzen Moment lang in den Augen des Ordenspriesters auf. Er weiß offenbar genau, wer die Gewalt gegen die Drusianer angezettelt hat. Doch er hält an sich.{/n} "Ihre Ladyschaft Incendia hat selbst über mich geurteilt, und so sehr sie sich auch bemüht hat, sie hat keine Dunkelheit in mir gesehen. Es war schon fast ein wenig unangenehm. Nicht, dass das etwas wäre, worüber man frohlocken könnte. Sie hat mir befohlen, persönlich ihre Urteile gegen meine Brüder und Schwestern auszuführen. Eine schwere Last ... Aber besser ich als ihre Henker." {n}Der Mann verstummt und ballt die Fäuste, bis sie knacken.{/n}

languages.text: « Oui, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai moi-même été étonné que le destin prenne une telle tournure. » {n}L'espace d'un instant, les yeux de Chapelain brillent de souffrance et de colère, comme pour vous signifier qu'il sait parfaitement qui est à l'origine des violences contre les Drusiens, mais il reprend contenance.{/n} « Sa Seigneurie Incendia m'a jugé elle-même et, malgré son insistance, n'a trouvé aucune trace de ténèbres en moi. C'était même assez gênant... Cependant, ce verdict n'a rien de réjouissant. Elle m'a ordonné d'appliquer les sentences de ses jugements à l'encontre de mes frères et de mes sœurs. Un lourd fardeau... mais il valait mieux que ce soit moi plutôt que ses bourreaux. » {n}Il se tait et serre les poings à s'en faire craquer les jointures.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's a curious turn of fate." {n}Judging by the pain and anger that flash in Chaplain's eyes for an instant, he knows full well who instigated the violence against the Drusians. But he contains himself.{/n} "Her Ladyship Incendia judged me herself, and hard as she tried, she saw no darkness in me. It was a bit awkward, as a matter of fact. Not that it's anything to rejoice at. She ordered me to personally carry out her verdicts against my brothers and sisters. A heavy burden... But better me than her executioners." {n}The man falls silent and clenches his fists until they crack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oui, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai moi-même été étonné que le destin prenne une telle tournure. » {n}L'espace d'un instant, les yeux de Chapelain brillent de souffrance et de colère, comme pour vous signifier qu'il sait parfaitement qui est à l'origine des violences contre les Drusiens, mais il reprend contenance.{/n} « Sa Seigneurie Incendia m'a jugé elle-même et, malgré son insistance, n'a trouvé aucune trace de ténèbres en moi. C'était même assez gênant, je dois dire... Cependant, ce verdict n'a rien de réjouissant. Elle m'a ordonné d'appliquer les sentences de ses jugements à l'encontre de mes frères et de mes sœurs. Un lourd fardeau... mais il valait mieux que ce soit moi plutôt que ses bourreaux. » {n}Il se tait et serre les poings à s'en faire craquer les jointures.{/n}

languages.text: "Evet {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, kaderin oyunu işte." {n}Papaz'ın gözlerinde bir anlığına yanıp kaybolan acı ve öfke nedeniyle anlıyorsun ki, Drusçulara yönelik şiddeti kimin başlattığının gayet farkında ama kendini tutuyor.{/n} "Leydi Hazretleri İncendia benim hakkımdaki hükmü bizzat verdi ve ne kadar çabaladıysa da içimde karanlık görmeyi başaramadı. Tuhaf bir andı doğrusunu isterseniz. Mutlu olunacak bir şey değildi tabii. Kardeşlerime karşı verdiği hükümleri bizzat yerine getirmemi emretti. Ağır bir yük ancak bunu, onun idam mangasındansa benim yapmam daha iyi." {n}Sessizleşiyor ve parmakları çatırdayana kadar yumruğunu sıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's a curious turn of fate." {n}Judging by the pain and anger that flash in Chaplain's eyes for an instant, he knows full well who instigated the violence against the Drusians. But he contains himself.{/n} "Her Ladyship Incendia judged me herself, and hard as she tried, she saw no darkness in me. It was a bit awkward, as a matter of fact. Not that it's anything to rejoice at. She ordered me to personally carry out her verdicts against my brothers and sisters. A heavy burden... But better me than her executioners." {n}The man falls silent and clenches his fists until they crack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Evet {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, kaderin oyunu işte." {n}Papaz'ın gözlerinde bir anlığına yanıp kaybolan acı ve öfke nedeniyle anlıyorsun ki, Drusçulara yönelik şiddeti kimin başlattığının gayet farkında ama kendini tutuyor.{/n} "Leydi Hazretleri İncendia benim hakkımdaki hükmü bizzat verdi ve ne kadar çabaladıysa da içimde karanlık görmeyi başaramadı. Tuhaf bir andı doğrusunu isterseniz. Mutlu olunacak bir şey değildi tabii. Kardeşlerime karşı verdiği hükümleri bizzat yerine getirmemi emretti. Ağır bir yük ancak bunu, onun idam mangasındansa benim yapmam daha iyi." {n}Sessizleşiyor ve parmakları çatırdayana kadar yumruğunu sıkıyor.{/n}
